attributes.action: Stop the EU denying right of asylum to refugees by building internment camps.
attributes.background:
The EU is aiming to deny the right of asylum to innumerable refugees by funding and building camps for them in Africa & elsewhere, outside the European Union.

Once the proposed system of refugee camps outside the EU is in place, asylum claims from inside the camps would be inadmissible in Europe.

rejection.details: The UK Government does not have responsibility for the whole of Europe. You could submit a petition asking for the Government to "put pressure on" or "urge" the EU to take a certain action.
